name: The Color Lord
description:
Game made for Mini Jam 111
The Color Lord is a game where you create you own bullet hell. Fill the sceen with projectiles formed out of three core color elements, red, green and blue. Each of those core colors has their own characteristics, such as red making projectiles faster and explosive on contact.

Most colors you can embody are made from more than one core color. That means that they have attributes of all core colors they are made from. Violet projectiles? They will behave as red and blue combined.

I recommend playing your favourite music over it.

Have fun :)
